patthana16.25:4.1: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:4.2: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:4.3: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo ca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:5.1: Abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:5.2: Abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:5.3: Abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nanadassanena pahātabbo ca naabyākato nanadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:6.1: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:6.2: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:6.3: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:7.1: Abyākataṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:8.1: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:8.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana16.25:9.1: Akusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:10.1: Abyākataṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:11.1: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:11.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana16.25:12.1: Akusalaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:13.1: Kusalaṃ savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:13.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.25:14.1: Kusalaṃ avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:14.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.25:15.1: Kusalaṃ savicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:15.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.25:16.1: Kusalaṃ avicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:16.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.25:17.1: Kusalaṃ sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:17.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.25:18.1: Kusalaṃ appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:18.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.25:19.1: Kusalaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:19.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.25:20.1: Kusalaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:20.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.25:21.1: Kusalaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:21.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.25:22.1: Kusalaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:22.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.25:23.1: Kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:23.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.25:24.1: Kusalaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:24.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.25:25.1: Abyākataṃ kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:26.1: Kusalaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:26.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.25:27.1: Kusalaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:27.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.25:28.1: Abyākataṃ narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:29.1: Kusalaṃ arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:30.1: Abyākataṃ naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanaarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:31.1: Abyākataṃ pariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:31.3: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana16.25:32.1: Kusalaṃ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:32.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.25:33.1: Kusalaṃ niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:34.1: Abyākataṃ aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:35.1: Kusalaṃ niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:36.1: Abyākataṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:37.1: Abyākataṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:37.3: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana16.25:38.1: Kusalaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:39.1: Akusalaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:39.2: Akusalaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:39.3: Akusalaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasaraṇo ca naakusalo nasaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:40.1: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:40.2: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.25:40.3: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naaraṇo ca naabyākato naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
